Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ụbọchị December 1 nke afọ ọbụla bụ nke ngalaba ahụike mba ụwa ji eme ncheta agha a na-ebuso HIV gụnyere mgbochi ya, nyocha ya, nlekọta ọgwụgwọ ya, dgz.
Dịka ngalaba World Health Organisation si depụta, ncheta nke afọ 2020 na-ebu aka maka mkpa mkpa covid na-akpa na mba ụwa niile mana a na-aja ndị nọ n'ihu agha a ike.
World Aids Day: HIV n'ọnụọgụgụ
Nri onye nwere nje HIV kwesịrị iri
Otu onye rịagoro ọrịa site n'afọ 2014 ruo afọ 2018 gwara BBC ka o si were ọnọdụ a na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka site n'ịgwa ha okwu nkasiobi nakwa ihe ha ga-eji ndụ ha mee n'ọnọdụ di etu ahụ.
O kwukwara na mgbe ọ chopụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa a, ọ maghị ka ọ ga-esi gwa nne na nna ya.
Gere ihe o kwuru n'uju n'ihe nkiri a.
Naijịrịa nwere nwakpo Lassa fever kachasị nụ
Kedu ihe mere mmadụ 800,000 ji egbu onwe ha kwa afọ?
Isiokwu #WorldAIDSDay nke afọ 2018 bụ "mara ọnọdụ gị".
Ọtụtụ ngalaba ahụike mbaụwa ekwuola obi ha gbasara ncheta ụbọchị HIV/AIDS.
Otu n'ime ha bụ World Health Organisation. Ha kwuru na otu onye n'ime mmadụ anọ ọbụla na mbaụwa niile nwere ọrịa HIV/AIDS mana ha amaghị.
Akụkọ ndị ga-amasị gị:
Nwaanyị ji egwu agwọ ọrịa
Ọrịa kansa abụghị ikpe ọnwụ
Ọrịa afọ ọsịsa etipuola na Borno
Ndị ji mgbatị ahụ agwọ ọrịa
